Class.name: Report.FINAPPayment
Class.ViewQuery: select SQLUser.FINAPPayment.Company as FINAPPayment_Company,SQLUser.FINAPPaymentLine.Company as FINAPPaymentLine_Company,SQLUser.FINAPPayment.Number as PaymentNumber,SQLUser.FINAPPayment.BankAccount,SQLUser.FINAPPaymentLine.PaymentNumber as LinePaymentNumber,SQLUser.FINAPPaymentLine.LineNumber,SQLUser.FINAPPaymentLine.SupplierNumber,SQLUser.FINAPPayment.DueDate,SQLUser.FINAPPayment.EnteredDate,SQLUser.FINAPPayment.PaymentDate,SQLUser.FINAPPaymentLine.Total,SQLUser.FINAPPayment.Status,SQLUser.FINAPPaymentLine.TotalDisc,SQLUser.FINAPPayment.TotalPaymentValue,SQLUser.FINAPPaymentLine.SupplierName,SQLUser.FINAPPaymentLine.RemittanceName from SQLUser.FINAPPayment,SQLUser.FINAPPaymentLine where (FINAPPayment.Number=FINAPPaymentLine.PaymentNumber)
